ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Cd-Key!
ygData.msgSnippet: You better buy the game again then bc I don t know anyone crazy enough to just give their account away. luv, -Su
ygData.messageBody:
You better buy the game again then bc I don't know anyone crazy enough to
just give their account away.
luv,
-Su

> Hi, I'm an old EQ user, but i gave me account to a friend. I played
> DAOC for a little, but its boring and I want to get back to EQ. The
> problem is, my friend is still using the account and my cd-key. Is
> there any former players that don't need their cd-keys and they could
> possible e-mail it to me? i would greatly appreciate it. If
> not....i'll have to buy the game...again.
>
>
>
> Visit the EverQuest homepage at http://www.everquest.com
